body_html:
@Carmezim You've been extremely helpful, thanks! In terms of the log messages, I think we've been surprised by how surprised people by them (perhaps as a result of TensorFlow originally being designed as server software for Linux, where verbose logging is not so unusual).

We're trying to figure out a way to make these messages less worrisome and more actionable, but in the meantime having it in the FAQ will be useful, and that should hopefully happen soon!

body:
@Carmezim You've been extremely helpful, thanks! In terms of the log messages, I think we've been surprised by how surprised people by them (perhaps as a result of TensorFlow originally being designed as server software for Linux, where verbose logging is not so unusual).

We're trying to figure out a way to make these messages less worrisome and more actionable, but in the meantime having it in the FAQ will be useful, and that should hopefully happen soon!
